data.name: Master Shot VR
data.detailed_description:
Master Shot VR

Take your best shot with Master Shot VR., the ultimate virtual gun range. Fire an arsenal full of realistic weapons from revolvers and automatic pistols to sub-machine guns at drone targets and various attackers.

Use your shooting skills to survive a range of dangerous scenarios. Put YOUR skills on display competing globally in a wide range of realistic shooting challenges. Our weapons handling is so lifelike, you'll have to reload.

You can play in Gun Range or Survival game modes, with new weapons, challenges, environments and attackers constantly being added.

Do you have what it takes to become the Master Shot? OR prepare to be blown away.

Features

⦁ Realistic weapons behavior
⦁ Drone targets and survival scenarios
⦁ Shoot AK’s, MP5’s and many other guns
⦁ Night fights
⦁ Two-handed gun handling
⦁ Time trials and other challenges
⦁ Global leaderboards

data.short_description:
MASTER SHOT VR

Take your best shot with Master Shot VR., the ultimate virtual gun range. Fire an arsenal full of realistic weapons from revolvers and automatic pistols to sub-machine guns at drone targets and various attackers.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 980 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
